alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 8:07PM MST until August 21 at 10:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN PIMA AND SOUTHWESTERN PINAL COUNTIES... At 807 PM MST, Doppler radar continued to indicate thunderstorms producing very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen north of Santa Rosa along route 15. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Santa Rosa, Anegam, North Komelik, Kohatk, Palo Verde Stand, Ventana, Vaya Chin, Jack Rabbit, San Luis and Santa Rosa School. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
